resources.string: The Android system automatically sends broadcasts when various system events occur, such as when the system switches in and out of airplane mode. The system sends these broadcasts to all apps that are subscribed to receive the event

A broadcast receiver is an Android component that allows an application to respond to messages (an Android Intent ) that are broadcast by the Android operating system or by an application.It will react to broadcast announcements. It will do background functionalities as services. It will pass the data between activities.
